sku_id ,
order_id ,
batch_number ,
stock ,
measure_unit ,
price ,
amount ,
status ,
remark ,
create_time, creator, update_time, updator ) VALUES(
#{sku_id} ,
#{order_id} ,
#{batch_number} ,
#{stock} ,
#{measure_unit} ,
#{price} ,
#{amount} ,
#{status} ,
#{remark} ,
now(), #{creator}, now(), #{updator} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
mapper.update: UPDATE w_order_add_sku set is_delete = 'Y' where id = #{id}

UPDATE w_order_add_sku a set
a.sku_id = #{sku_id} ,
a.order_id = #{order_id} ,
a.batch_number = #{batch_number} ,
a.stock = #{stock} ,
a.measure_unit = #{measure_unit} ,
a.price = #{price} ,
a.amount = #{amount} ,
a.status = #{status} ,
a.remark = #{remark} ,
a.create_time = #{create_time} ,
a.creator = #{creator} ,
a.is_delete = #{is_delete} ,
update_time = now(), a.updator = #{updator} where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as total FROM w_order_add_sku a

SELECT ws.id, ws. NAME, ws.number, ws.price, ws.stock, ws.introduction, ws.typed, ws. LEVEL, ws.sort, wst.text as type_name, ws.describes, ws. STATUS, ws.create_time FROM w_order_add_sku a left join w_sku ws ON ws.id = a.sku_id left join w_sku_type wst on wst.id = ws.type_id
limit #{start},#{end}

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT a.`name`,a.package,a.measure_unit,a.num,a.ea_num,a.rough_weight,a.net_weight,a.volume,a.worth,a.trace_number, c.`name` as provider_owner_name,c1.`name` as provider_carrier_name, c2.`name` as providername,ws.`name` settingname,wp.`name` as facilityname,w.`name` as warehousename,o.order_no, '理货' as type,o.end_time,o.purchase FROM w_order_asn_sku a LEFT JOIN w_order_asn o ON a.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c ON o.provider_owner_id = c.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c1 ON o.provider_carrier_id = c1.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c2 ON o.provider_id = c2.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse_site_setting ws ON a.setting_id = ws.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse_facility_setting wp ON a.facility_id = wp.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse w ON ws.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.is_delete = 'N'
and c.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{provider_owner_name},'%')
and a.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
and w.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{warehousename},'%')
union all SELECT a.`name`,a.package,a.measure_unit,a.num,a.ea_num,a.rough_weight,a.net_weight,a.volume,a.worth,a.trace_number, c.`name` as provider_owner_name,c1.`name` as provider_carrier_name, c2.`name` as providername,ws.`name` settingname,wp.`name` as facilityname,w.`name` as warehousename,o.order_no, '理货' as type,o.end_time,o.purchase FROM w_order_add_sku a LEFT JOIN w_order_add o ON a.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c ON o.provider_owner_id = c.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c1 ON o.provider_carrier_id = c1.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c2 ON o.provider_id = c2.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse_site_setting ws ON a.setting_id = ws.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse_facility_setting wp ON a.facility_id = wp.id LEFT JOIN w_warehouse w ON ws.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.is_delete = 'N'
and c.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{provider_owner_name},'%')
and a.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
and w.`name`LIKE concat('%',#{warehousename},'%')
limit #{start},#{end}

SELECT a.*,GROUP_CONCAT(o.name,',') as sku_name,c.`name` as ownername,c1.`name` as providername, s.val as priorityval FROM w_order_add a LEFT JOIN w_order_add_sku o on o.order_id = a.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c ON a.provider_owner_id = c.id LEFT JOIN w_cmn_provider c1 ON a.provider_id = c1.id LEFT JOIN sys_config s ON a.priority = s.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.is_delete = 'N'
and a.order_no LIKE concat('%',#{order_no},'%')
and c.name LIKE concat('%',#{ownername},'%')
and c1.name LIKE concat('%',#{providername},'%')
and a.priority = #{priority}
GROUP BY a.id
limit ${start},${end}
